name: Medium Knitting Bag - Garter Stitch
description:
This bag measures approximately 14” tall and 8” wide It holds 7”, 9” and even 10” straight needles nicely with plenty of room for yarn and instructions.  It has the same square bottom as my other bags so it stands alone, has a 14” handle and drawstring closure with wooden beads.  The fabric is machine washable but spot cleaning is recommended.

Proverbs 31:13 She shops around for the best yarns and cottons, and enjoys knitting and sewing.

name: Small Knitting Bag - Michael Miller 60's Flowers
description:
)  THIS BAG HAS NO INTERIOR POCKETS.  This bag measures approximately 9-1/2” tall and 8” wide and is large enough to hold smaller knitting and crochet projects such as socks, a scarf or baby items. It has a square bottom so it stands on its own.  It is made of cotton fabric and is fully lined, has a drawstring closure with wooden beads and a 14” handle. There is plenty of room for at least 2 balls of yarn, needles and patterns.  There is a ribbon on one side suitable for a carabiner (sold separately) so that you can hang your bag from your purse, luggage or belt buckle.  The fabric is machine washable but spot cleaning is always recommended.  

Proverbs 31:13 She shops around for the best yarns and cottons, and enjoys knitting and sewing.

name: Tween Bag - Michael Miller Birdies
description:
This bag is 3” shorter than a large bag but the same width. It measures 14” tall and 16” wide and 4” in depth.  There are no pockets inside the tween bag so there is plenty of room for lots of yarn, fiber and supplies.

Proverbs 31:13 She shops around for the best yarns and cottons, and enjoys knitting and sewing.

name: Peppermint Stitch Marker Set in Peppermint Box
description:
**THIS ITEM SHIPS FREE WHEN YOU PURCHASE ANOTHER ITEM**

This is a set of 3 stitch markers that fit up to size 10 needles.  The center stitch marker is a peppermint lampwork bead and the two others are glitter beads in shades of red.

The box is a super cute paper mache' box painted in a peppermint design. I'm no artist and the price is reflective of same. I just thought it would be fun to have a special gift for some of those Christmas swaps.  The peppermint is a 3" circle.

Proverbs 31:13 She shops around for the best yarns and cottons, and enjoys knitting and sewing.

name: Stitch Markers - Candy Canes
description:
This is a set of stitch markers that fit up to size 10 US Needles.

These ship free when purchased with another item from the shop.

name: Stitch Markers - Elves Clothes
description:
This is a set of 4 stitch markers that fit up to size 10 US needles.

This item ships free when purchased with another item from the shop.

name: Stitch Markers - Nutcrackers
description:
This is a set of 4 stitch markers that fit up to size 10 US Needles.

These ship free when purchased with another item from the shop.

name: Christmas B.A.M. 2013 - Comfort & Joy #20
description:
This B.A.M. makes me think of the Christmas Carol “Silent Night” – All is calm, all is bright.  The cool blue tones of the fabric and polka dot monochromatic lining are reminiscent of a gently falling snow.  

The bag measures approximately 9-1/2” tall and 8” wide and is large enough to hold smaller knitting and crochet projects such as socks, a scarf or baby items. It is made of cotton fabric and is fully lined, has a drawstring closure with wooden beads and a 14” handle. There is plenty of room for at least 2 balls of yarn, needles and patterns.  There is a ribbon on one side suitable for a carabiner (sold separately) so that you can hang your bag from your purse, luggage or belt buckle.  The fabric is machine washable but spot cleaning is always recommended.  

The yarn that accompanies this set coordinates with the fabric in the bag and comes with a snowflake charm.  The yarn that is photographed in this listing will be the yarn you receive.  Just as no two snowflakes are alike, each skein of yarn is somewhat different.  This yarn was dyed by independent dyer, Heather, from Highland Handmades.  Here is here description:

“No Two Flakes is a kettle dyed colorway that is as unique as the snowflakes that inspired it. A combination of the kettle dyeing process and the specific dyes used means that your skein is different from any other skein dyed - even one from the same pot! The result is a watercolor-esque skein of yarn that ranges from snowflake white to winter blue, interspersed with dainty flakes of dark blue throughout. The yarn was reskeined to better demonstrate how it will look when knit. The flecking is due to the nature of the dye.

Sugar Maple Sock Yarn  One skein of Sugar Maple Sock Yarn is more than enough for a pair of socks or a small shawlette. It is machine washable and dryable, but you may want to wash by hand and line dry in order to extend the life of your knit object.  Yardage: 425 yards  Composition: 75% SW Wool, 25% Nylon  Weight: 100 grams, fingering weight.  Gauge: 7-8 sts/inch on US 1-3 needles  All fibers from Highland Handmades are dyed with professional dyes and heat set, then rinsed in plain water.

In addition to the bag and yarn, you will receive the following with this B.A.M. offering:

A set of 6 square stitch markers which are great for fingering yarn projects in various colors of blue;

A super cute sheepy keyring handmade by Karen of https://www.etsy.com/shop/KaratStix (there are 4 different designed and they are chosen at random); and

A Candy Cane sweet treat.

THIS SET SHIPS FREE IN THE UNITED STATES.  PLEASE SEE SHIPPING COSTS FOR INTERNATIONAL SHIPMENTS

name: Mini Needlecase and Whatnots Pocket Set - Mini Geishas
description:
THIS ITEM SHIPS FREE WHEN PURCHASED WITH ANOTHER ITEM IN THE SHOP. The Mini Needlecase holds lots of circular needles as well as tape measures, stitch markers and the like.  It measures approximately 7 inches tall by 4 inches wide. The Whatnots Pockets measures 4 inches tall by 4 inches wide and holds everything from stitch markers and tape measures to emergency fiber funds.

You can't have enough of these little sets.

Proverbs 31:13 She shops around for the best yarns and cottons, and enjoys knitting and sewing.

description:
This is a set of 3 Mini Needlecases that are great for swaps or to just keep all those knitting accessories in each of your project bags. Individual cases usually sell for $8.00 each but you can get 3 for $20.00.  It holds lots of circular needles as well as tape measures, stitch markers and the like.  It measures approximately 7 inches tall by 4 inches wide.

name: AlterKnitting Skein Bag - Bold Flowers
description:
This bag measures 11" wide and 8" tall. There is a grommet on each side.  Just place your balled yarn on their side and thread the yarn through the grommet; pull the drawstring and snug up your two skeins to keep them in place. This little bag is great for alternating skeins or colorwork. Your yarn won't be a tangled mess as you cross your yarns back and forth.

There are no pockets in this bag.  

Proverbs 31:13 She shops around for the best yarns and cottons, and enjoys knitting and sewing.

name: Carabiner
description:
Use one of these handy carabiners to attach your KnittingsMyBag project bag to your purchase or the belt loop of your pants.  Each carabiner measures just under 2” and comes in a variety of colors (purple, blue, green, red, sliver and black) .  This item ships FREE when purchased with another item.
Proverbs 31:13  She shops around for the best yarns and cottons, and enjoys knitting and sewing.
